Uses of Class
model.Player

  • Packages that use Player 
    Package Description
    database  
    model  

    • Uses of Player in database

      Methods in database that return types with arguments of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> DatabaseLinker.loadPlayers()
      This is an initialisation method that is called when the application first starts.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Player> DatabaseLinker.loadSquad(java.util.UUID team_id, int round)
      This is the last of three methods called when returning team information.

    • Uses of Player in model

      Methods in model that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Player Players.getPlayer(java.util.UUID id)
      Returns a player object from the list if an id match can be made.
      Methods in model that return types with arguments of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Player> Players.getPlayers() 
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Player> Team.getSquad()
      This method returns a HashMap of the numbered positions in a team and the Player objects in those positions.
      Methods in model with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String Team.addPlayer(Player p, int position)
      This method is used when a user is creating a team for the first time.
      java.lang.String User.addPlayerToTeam(Player p, int position)
      This method is called when a user is creating a team for the first time and is adding a player into the team.
      java.lang.String Team.swapPlayers(Player player_in, int position_out)
      This method is used when a user is managing their team and wants to swap players on the field with players on the bench.
      java.lang.String User.swapPlayersInTeam(Player p, int position)
      This method is used when a user is managing their team and wants to swap players on the field with players on the bench.
      Method parameters in model with type arguments of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Team.setSquad(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Player> squad) 
      Constructor parameters in model with type arguments of type Player 
      Constructor and Description
      Players(java.util.ArrayList<Player> roster)
      Full roster of players is loaded when application first starts.
